examInfo.title: प्रदेश लोक सेवा आयोग, कर्णाली प्रदेश
examInfo.subtitle: इन्जिनियरिंग सेवा, सिभिल समूह, जनरल, हाइवे, स्यानिटरी, ईग्रेसेन उपसमूह अधिकृत सातौं तहको खुला समावेशी र अन्दर सेवा प्रतियोगितात्मक लिखित परीक्षा
examInfo.subject: Objective MCQs - Civil Engineering

instructions: कुनै पनि प्रश्नमा गलत उत्तरको लागि काट्ने प्रक्रिया छैन
समय सकिएपछि परीक्षा स्वतः जम्मा हुनेछ
Use flag feature to mark questions for review

questions.question: What is the standard size of a modular brick?
questions.explanation: As per IS 1077:1992, the standard size of modular brick is 190 mm × 90 mm × 90 mm.

questions.question: The process of improving load bearing capacity of soil is called:
questions.explanation: Soil stabilization is the process of improving the engineering properties of soil to increase its bearing capacity.

questions.question: What is the minimum grade of concrete recommended for RCC works as per IS 456?
questions.explanation: As per IS 456:2000, the minimum grade of concrete for RCC works is M20.

questions.question: The ratio of the volume of voids to the total volume of soil mass is called:
questions.explanation: Porosity (n) = Volume of voids / Total volume.

questions.question: The instrument used for measuring angles in surveying is:
questions.explanation: Theodolite is used for measuring horizontal and vertical angles in surveying.

questions.question: The maximum permissible deflection for a cantilever beam of length L is:
questions.explanation: As per IS 456:2000, maximum deflection for cantilever = L/250.
